effects.effect: Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effects.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moveDescription:
This attack can be used only if the user is asleep.
The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
